Riviera Ridge-Town Square Mall Shuttle

Description:

The RRT Shuttle leaves campus and travels to Target and Walmart, while also making stops at Denny's, Vestal Parkway, Riviera Ridge, Hollybrook, Burris Rd & Rano Blvd, Parkway Plaza, and Town Square Mall enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
The RRT Shuttle runs runs after 3:15 P.M. on Weekdays.

Before 3:15 P.M., please use the BC Transit Route 47 or BC Transit Route 57 for service to/from Riviera Ridge, Hollybrook, Target, Walmart, and Binghamton University.


Weekends:
The RRT Shuttle runs all day on Weekends.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.

F = Only operates Fridays.
